name: Singed
title: The Mad Chemist
lore: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledgeâ€”with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to many that Singed has lost all sense of humanity, leaving a toxic trail of misery and terror in his wake.

role-desc: Specialists are a diverse group of champions who do not "fit into a neat little box" in regards to other class/subclass specifications. Specialists exhibit "zone control" either as a dominant or secondary attribute.

p-desc: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

q-desc: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

w-desc: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

e-desc: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

r-desc: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.
